Talk32:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive>Is that it?!<sp:5:1:0> Ooohoo...<sp:5:1:0>not to worry.
These marvelous monster parts...

<sp:3:0:2:0800>They have many—<sp:5:0:0>MANY—<sp:5:0:0>unique and
unknown uses beyond mere boiling
to make elixirs!
Talk_93:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive>I'm overjoyed to explain as many times
as you want!
Talk_94:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>If you attach a <clr:0000>Fire Keese eyeball<clr:ffff> to
an arrow and fire it... <sp:5:1:0>BEHOLD!

The arrow flies in pursuit of whatever
foe the eyeball...laid eyes upon. Such
a curious and fearsome magical power!
<sp:0:2:2:5000>Though, ehmmm, I've never tested it myself since
I am not so good with a bow.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk90000:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Unngg... <sp:5:1:0>I can't make out the
whereabouts of any Bubbulfrogs.<sp:5:1:0>
Talk_95:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>This <clr:0000>White-Maned Lynel mace horn<clr:ffff>
comes from a particularly ferocious
specimen, even by Lynel standards.
It's said that if you attach it to the tip of
a weapon, <sp:5:0:0>that weapon will be filled with
rock-smashing power.
Talk9001:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Ah, yes, not far from here... <sp:5:0:0>I sense a
Bubbulfrog stirs somewhere <clr:0000>around
the bottom of the canyon to the east<clr:ffff>!
Talk_96:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I'm told <clr:0000>Ice-Breath Lizalfos tails <clr:ffff>extend
the attack range of the weapons they're
attached to.
But that's not all! <sp:5:1:0>I understand they imbue
weapons with the power to freeze
enemies too.
Talk4001:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Ahh yes, quite near here... <sp:5:0:0>I sense a
Bubbulfrog wriggles near the
<clr:0000>Isle of Rabac<clr:ffff>!
Talk9002:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><clr:0000>South<clr:ffff> of here, yes... <sp:5:0:0>I sense a Bubbulfrog
romping near the <clr:0000>East Gerudo Ruins<clr:ffff>!
Talk_97:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>These <clr:0000>Gleeok wings<clr:ffff> come from one of
those giant three-headed monsters that
have been seen of late.
If you affix them to a weapon or arrow,
they'll stabilize your stance and greatly
increase the weapon's range.
Talk4002:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><clr:0000>Southeast<clr:ffff> from here...<sp:5:0:0>there's an
excavation company called <clr:0000>YunoboCo<clr:ffff>...<sp:0:4:0>Heheee indeed, I sense a Bubbulfrog
hibiddy-bobbing about <clr:0000>east <clr:ffff>of their
headquarters!
Talk9003:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Ah, yes, <clr:0000>southwest<clr:ffff> of here... <sp:5:0:0>I sense a
Bubbulfrog cavorts somewhere beyond
the <clr:0000>Kara Kara Bazaar<clr:ffff>!
Talk_98:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>These <clr:0000>Gleeok thunder horns<clr:ffff> come from a
specimen that fires quite a lot of lightning,
even by three-headed-monster standards.
Of course, attaching it to a weapon fills
that weapon with the horn's stored-up
lightning power.
It's said common monsters don't stand
a chance against its destructive powers.
Talk4003:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><clr:0000>Southeast<clr:ffff> from here...<sp:5:0:0>there's an
excavation company called <clr:0000>YunoboCo<clr:ffff>...<sp:0:4:0>Heheee indeed, I sense a Bubbulfrog
skittery-scooting about <clr:0000>south <clr:ffff>of their
headquarters!
Talk9004:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Ah, I see there's <clr:0000>quicksand <clr:ffff>to the
<clr:0000>southwest<clr:ffff> of here. I sense a Bubbulfrog
sits somewhere near there!
Talk_99:
Go on, what do you say? <sp:5:0:0>If you
have <clr:0000>Bubbul gems<clr:ffff>, I'll trade them
for treeeasure!
Talk4004:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>I see, yes, <clr:0000>south<clr:ffff> of here... <sp:5:0:0>I sense a
Bubbulfrog gamboling near the
<clr:0000>Goronbi River<clr:ffff>!
Talk9005:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>A little <clr:0000>south<clr:ffff> from here... <sp:5:0:0>I sense a
Bubbulfrog scampers near an <clr:0000>area
with lots of quicksand<clr:ffff>!
Talk4005:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>I sense a Bubbulfrog dallying near the
<clr:0000>Deplian Badlands<clr:ffff>, far to the <clr:0000>west<clr:ffff> of here!
Talk_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Greetings and good meetings!<sp:5:1:0> I trade
treasure for <clr:0000>Bubbul gems<clr:ffff>!
Talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:SurpriseM>Gwaah! <sp:5:0:0>You're the nice traveler from
before!

<sp:3:0:2:0701>You gave me your Bubbul gem. So kind.
Many thanks!
Talk11001:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Near here, yes, quite near... <sp:5:0:0>I sense a
Bubbulfrog romps somewhere <clr:0000>west of
Robred Dropoff<clr:ffff>!
Talk_02:
You know...<sp:5:0:0>it was a very special moment
for me...<sp:5:1:0>yes, very special...<sp:5:0:0>
Talk11002:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Ah, <clr:0000>south<clr:ffff> of here... <sp:5:0:0>I sense a Bubbulfrog
lounges somewhere near <clr:0000>Oakle's Navel<clr:ffff>!
Talk_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0901><snd:Hysterical_00>Nnngggyaaat! <sp:5:1:0>I need more Bubbul gems!<sp:5:1:0>
I must have mooore!<sp:5:1:0>
Talk11003:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Hoo, yes, <clr:0000>east<clr:ffff> of here... <sp:5:0:0>I sense a
Bubbulfrog rests near <clr:0000>Retsam Forest<clr:ffff>,
not far from Hateno Village!
Talk11004:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Ah, just a little <clr:0000>east<clr:ffff> of here... <sp:5:0:0>I sense a
Bubbulfrog wallowing somewhere near
<clr:0000>Walnot Mountain<clr:ffff>!
Talk_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Ever since we parted, I've been traveling
far and wide, and yet I still haven't
gathered a single Bubbul gem.
WHEN will I become a Satori? WHAT am
I to do?
Talk_91_00_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>The mystic headpiece,<sp:5:0:0> mystic robe,
<sp:5:0:0>and mystic trousers <sp:5:0:0>are very rare
treasures indeed...
According to ancient texts, <sp:5:1:0>the wearer
is protected from any and all injuries.

But it's also said these strange
clothes prevent the wearer from
becoming rich. A tricky trade-off, no?
<sp:3:0:2:0a01>I tried to wear them myself, <sp:5:1:0>but the
sizes didn't seem to fit.

<sp:3:0:2:0800>Fwaahaha,<sp:5:1:0> but they seem the perfect size
for you!
Talk11005:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Hmm, it's fairly far <clr:0000>southeast<clr:ffff> of here...<sp:5:0:0>
But I sense a Bubbulfrog dallying near
<clr:0000>Mount Dunsel<clr:ffff>!
Talk_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>It can't be a coincidence we meet again,
traveler. Fate...yes, FATE...brought us
back together. I'm sure of it.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800>PLEASE! If you get your fingers on any
more <clr:0000>Bubbul gems<clr:ffff>, would you give
them to me?
I promise I'll give you suitable <clr:0000>treasures<clr:ffff>
in exchange for them!

<sp:3:0:2:0000>For example, look up there!<sp:5:0:0>
Talk_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy_02>That <clr:0000>mystic clothing<clr:ffff> there is all
yours...<sp:5:0:0>if you bring me lots and
lots of <clr:0000>Bubbul gems<clr:ffff>!<sp:5:0:0>
Talk_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Greeting_02>Yes then, yes! <sp:5:0:0>If you get your fingers on
any <clr:0000>Bubbul gems<clr:ffff>, please bring them
to me!
I'll be <clr:0000>traveling far and wide<clr:ffff> in search of
those gems myself. So if you spot my stall
<clr:0000>at night<clr:ffff>, don't be shy—do come by!
Talk_11:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Greeting_00>Good evening, traveler.<sp:5:0:0> It's a fine night,
yes, very fine.
Talk_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:QuestionNormal>Bwaah? <sp:5:1:0>Your pouch is very full. Even if
I gave you the treasure, you wouldn't
be able to carry it.
Please come back once you've made
some room in there.
Talk_91_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>The next treasure <sp:5:1:0>is the <clr:0000>mystic robe<clr:ffff>
you've had your eyeball on!<sp:5:1:0>
Talk_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Greeting_00>Good evening, traveler.<sp:0:4:0>Foul weather can't foul my mood when
I'm on my way to becoming a Satori.
Talk_91_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>The next treasure is one you've been
waiting for...<sp:5:1:0> Fashionable as well as
valuable...<sp:5:1:0>it's the <clr:0000>mystic trousers<clr:ffff>!<sp:5:1:0>
Talk_101:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>My big brother, Kilton, gave me this
<clr:0000>Moblin mask<clr:ffff>.

Do you see? It's a mask that's so
realistic, it could fool an actual Moblin!

<sp:3:0:2:0000>You want one, do you not? <sp:5:1:0>Well, <sp:5:0:0>why not
add it to your collection?
Talk_13:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Bwaaah! <sp:5:1:0>Look at the time!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700>Traveler, I'm very sorry you came all the
way here at this unfortunate hour. <sp:5:1:0>But we
must meet again when it's <clr:0000>night<clr:ffff>!
Talk_102: <sp:3:0:2:0700>I'll dally no more. Here I gooo...
Talk_104_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:SurpriseS_01>MmAAAH, <sp:5:1:0>I feel something bubbling up
from deep inside me...<sp:5:0:0>I think...
Talk_91_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>The next treasure <sp:5:1:0>is the last I have
to give! It iiis...<sp:5:1:0>the <clr:0000>mystic headpiece<clr:ffff>!
Talk_104_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:SurpriseS_01>OoHAAA, <sp:5:1:0>whaaat IS this strange feeling
running upways and downwise my body?!
Talk_104:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:SurpriseS_01>HooOO, <sp:5:0:0>my body is filling with
mysterious pow...<sp:5:0:0>POWER...
Talk_104_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0901><snd:Angry_00>Nnngggyaaat! <sp:5:1:0>I need more Bubbul gems!<sp:5:1:0>
I must have mooore!<sp:5:1:0>
Talk_104_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Hysterical_00>Nnngggyaaat! <sp:5:1:0>It's... <sp:5:0:0>It's still not enough!<sp:5:0:0>
NOT ENOUGH Bubbul gems!<sp:5:1:0>
Talk_106:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>My big brother, Kilton, gave me this
<clr:0000>Lizalfos mask<clr:ffff>.

Look! See! It's a mask so very realistic,
it could fool an actual Lizalfos!

<sp:3:0:2:0000>You want one, I'm sure of it. <sp:5:1:0>So, SO...<sp:5:0:0>
why not add it to your collection?
Talk5001:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Yes, YES, <clr:0000>southwest<clr:ffff> of here...<sp:5:0:0>
I sense a Bubbulfrog ambling near
<clr:0000>Akkala Citadel Ruins<clr:ffff>!
Talk_107:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>This <clr:0000>Horriblin mask <clr:ffff>was a gift from my
big brother, Kilton.

Look! Looook! This mask is sooo realistic,
it could fool an actual Horriblin!

<sp:3:0:2:0000>You want one! You do! <sp:5:1:0>So I ask, <sp:5:0:0>why not
add it to your collection?
Talk5002:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>There it is, <clr:0000>west<clr:ffff> from here... <sp:5:0:0>I sense a
Bubbulfrog lollygags near <clr:0000>Lake Intenoch<clr:ffff>!
Talk_21:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Notice_01>Oh yes! <sp:5:0:0>I forgot to mention something
important!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>When it comes to Bubbul gems, I believe
<clr:0000>gobbling down many at once<clr:ffff> is the key to
turning into a Satori!
So, in the future, please bring me
<clr:0000>the quantity I ask for<clr:ffff> all together.

<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Pass_00>The reward I give you will be based on
how many gems you give me. <sp:5:0:0>A good
deal for us both!
Talk_19:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Pass>Now that I am myself once more...<sp:5:1:0>please,
here's the treasure I promised you.
Talk_108:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>This <clr:0000>Lynel mask <clr:ffff>was a gift from my
big brother, Kilton.

I tell you, this mask is so very elaborate
and realistic, it could fool one of those
beastly Lynels!
<sp:3:0:2:0000>I'm certain you want one. You must!<sp:5:1:0>
So, <sp:5:0:0>why not add it to your collection?
Talk5003:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><clr:0000>Southeast<clr:ffff> of here... <sp:5:0:0>I sense a Bubbulfrog
bobbling near the <clr:0000>eastern side of
Ulria Grotto<clr:ffff>!
Talk_22:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Notice_01>Whaa! <sp:5:1:0>What is that I sense?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0101>Traveler...<sp:5:1:0>could it be that you have GOBS
of Bubbul gems in your possession?
Talk_111:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Of course, if you happen to have any
remaining <clr:0000>Bubbul gems<clr:ffff>, I'll happily trade
them for treasure!
Talk_109:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>These <clr:0000>nails <clr:ffff>come from the terrifying,
one-eyed giant Hinox—a beast it's best
not to get close to.
It must be said...<sp:5:0:0><clr:0000>monster fangs and nails<clr:ffff>
don't have much destructive power when
attached to weapons.
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:QuestionNormal_01>But what do you think happens when
they're used as <clr:0000>arrowheads<clr:ffff>?<sp:5:1:0>

<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_03>Why, I'll tell you!<sp:5:1:0> Their sinister shape
increases the arrow's destructive power
quite tremendously!
<sp:3:0:2:0001><sp:0:2:2:5000>Of course, I toiled tirelessly to build up my
collection, so...eh...I would never use these
specimens in such a way.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk5004:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>It's a little ways <clr:0000>south<clr:ffff> of here... <sp:5:0:0>But I
sense a Bubbulfrog plopped down near
the <clr:0000>western side of Ploymus Mountain<clr:ffff>!
Talk_23:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><clr:0000><snd:Greeting_02><clr:ffff>If you have <clr:0000>Bubbul gems<clr:ffff>, I'll traaade them
for treeeasure!
Talk_91_01_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Have you been enjoying the mystic robe
I gave you before?

Well, these <clr:0000>mystic trousers<clr:ffff> are a RARE
treasure <sp:5:0:0>with the same power as that
mystic robe.
<sp:3:0:2:0000>But the two together? Well, there's no
doubt that a top and bottom set will
make that power even more powerful!
Talk5005:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>It's a quite a journey <clr:0000>south<clr:ffff> from here... <sp:5:0:0>
But I sense a Bubbulfrog hanging around
<clr:0000>Horon Lagoon<clr:ffff>!
Talk_26:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy>Fwaahaha! <sp:5:1:0>I'm happy beyond all
happiness!<sp:5:1:0> At last...<sp:5:1:0>the dream I've
dreamed for so many years...<sp:5:1:0>
Talk_28:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Hnnggg...<sp:5:1:0>hurrgh...<sp:5:1:0>something's happening.
<sp:5:1:0>Something strange...and uncomfortable...
and...and different from before.<sp:5:1:0>
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseS_01>Gwaaawah?!<sp:5:1:0> This is it...<sp:5:0:0>I am finally...


<sp:3:0:2:0800>FINALLY...turning into a <clr:0000>Satori<clr:ffff>!<sp:5:1:0>


<sp:3:0:2:0700>Sadly, I don't have any treasure left to
give you... <sp:5:1:0>

But I must reward you somehow,<sp:5:0:0>
so please, PLEASE accept this <clr:0000>item
I made myself<clr:ffff>!
Talk_30:
You found all of the Bubbul gems.
You should meet with Koltin.
Talk_76_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Hwah! <sp:5:1:0>What if I need to eat ALL of the
Bubbul gems?
Talk_121:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>And I'll let you in on a little seeecret...<sp:0:4:0>Ever since I ate that first Bubbul gem, <sp:5:0:0>
I've been able to SENSE the <clr:0000>presence of
Bubbulfrogs<clr:ffff>...<sp:5:0:0>er, though, not all of them.
<sp:3:0:2:0100>For you, l can put my Bubbulfrog feelers
to work and seek out <clr:0000>places they're
likely to be found<clr:ffff>!
Talk_76_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Traveler! <sp:5:1:0>I promise, this is the last thing
I'll ask of you!<sp:0:4:0>Would you...<sp:5:1:0>prettiest please...<sp:5:1:0>collect
ALL of the remaining Bubbul gems?
Talk_76_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>No...<sp:5:1:0>it's not right...<sp:5:0:0>I don't have a single
treasure left to trade.

I couldn't...<sp:5:1:0>I shouldn't ask such a favor
of you.
Talk_55_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Traveler...<sp:5:1:0> Thank you so very much for
joining me as I chased my dream!<sp:5:0:0>

You've helped me get this far.<sp:5:1:0> No matter
the outcome, I have no regrets! NONE!<sp:5:1:0>
Talk_55_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_02>I look forward to meeting you again<sp:5:0:0>
somewhere and in some form!<sp:5:1:0> Take care!<sp:1:3:4:1e000000>
Talk1001:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Yes, YES, <clr:0000>northwest<clr:ffff> of here... <sp:5:0:0>I sense a

Passeri Greenbelt<clr:ffff>!
Talk1002:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Ooo yes, <clr:0000>east<clr:ffff> of here... <sp:5:0:0>I sense a

Talk1003:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Yes! <clr:0000>West <clr:ffff>of here... <sp:5:0:0>I sense a Bubbulfrog
stirs near the <clr:0000>Sage Temple Ruins<clr:ffff>!
Talk1004:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><clr:0000>Faaar west<clr:ffff> of here...<sp:5:0:0>I sense a Bubbulfrog
tippy-toes downstream the <clr:0000>Tamio River<clr:ffff>!
Talk1005:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Ah yes, <clr:0000>south<clr:ffff> of here... <sp:5:0:0>I sense a

Talk13001:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Hoo, yes, I sense a Bubbulfrog cavorting
somewhere near the shore of <clr:0000>Cora Lake<clr:ffff>,
<clr:0000>southwest<clr:ffff> of here!
Talk13002:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>I sense a Bubbulfrog hiding somewhere
near the <clr:0000>eastern surface of Lake Hylia<clr:ffff>!
Talk13003:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>There, yes, I sense a Bubbulfrog hopping
near <clr:0000>Tobio's Hollow<clr:ffff>, <clr:0000>east<clr:ffff> of here!
Talk13004:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Clearly yes, I can sense a Bubbulfrog
cavorting near <clr:0000>Corta Lake<clr:ffff>, <clr:0000>east<clr:ffff> of here!
Talk_91_02_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>It is rare...extremely rare...just like the
mystic robe and mystic trousers.<sp:5:0:0>

<sp:3:0:2:0000>Ah, but put these three all together, and
you're sure to draw out the BIGNESS of
their power!
Talk13005:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Just a little <clr:0000>south<clr:ffff> of here... <sp:5:0:0>I sense a
Bubbulfrog perched somewhere near
<clr:0000>Puffer Beach<clr:ffff>!
Talk_50:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><clr:0000><snd:Greeting_01><clr:ffff>Please. Come trade with me again when
you've collected <clr:0000><sp:2:2:28:22004e007500730068006900530068006f0070005f0043006f00730074004e0075006d00ffff00cd> Bubbul gems<clr:ffff>.
Talk_55:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>If you wouldn't mind, <sp:5:0:0>please show this
to <clr:0000>Kilton<clr:ffff> and give him my best.
Talk_61:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:SurpriseM_00>I can't believe you collected each and
every Bubbul gem, traveler!

<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Think_00>Hurmmm...<sp:5:1:0>to gather them all and bring
them here, it's such a tremendous feat.<sp:5:1:0>
Ah, I think I understand...
Talk_30_01: You found all of the Bubbul gems!
Talk_63:
<sp:3:0:2:0901><snd:Angry>Nnngggyaaat! <sp:5:1:0>You do NOT have enough
Bubbul gems!<sp:5:1:0>
Talk_64:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01>Sorry. So very sorry.<sp:5:1:0> I did not mean to
lose hold of my calm.
Talk_70:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I will focus my senses and try searching
for Bubbulfrogs.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c00>Hrrrnnn...<sp:5:1:0>
Talk_71: <sp:3:0:2:0100>That's all I can say about that.
Talk_73:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Think_01>I can sense the presence of...<sp:5:1:0>
<clr:0000>ZERO <clr:ffff>Bubbulfrogs.<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseM_01>I don't believe it!<sp:5:0:0> You collected...


<sp:3:0:2:0000>EACH and EVERY Bubbul gem?!<sp:0:4:0><snd:SurpriseS_01>Traveler...<sp:5:0:0>you didn't do that...<sp:5:0:0>just for
ME did you?
Talk_74:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Of course, of course...<sp:5:1:0>you went to so
very much trouble to collect them,
after all...
Talk_102_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy>I am overjoyed, yes, I am!<sp:5:1:0> I knew you'd
come through, traveler!<sp:5:1:0>
Talk_76:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>*sigh* <sp:5:1:0>I've eaten all these Bubbul gems,
and I still haven't turned into a Satori.
Talk_78:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Greeting_01>Though, you know...<sp:5:0:0>perhaps it's because
of allll the Bubbul gems I've gobbled up...

but I can, at last, sense the <clr:0000>presence of
each and every Bubbulfrog<clr:ffff> across the
vaaastness of Hyrule.
I admit, of course, I don't know exactly
where they are. Still...
Talk3001:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><clr:0000>Southwest<clr:ffff> of here... <sp:5:0:0>I sense a Bubbulfrog
capers near the <clr:0000>Kopeeki Drifts<clr:ffff>!
Talk3002:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Yes, <clr:0000>west<clr:ffff> of here... <sp:5:0:0>I sense a Bubbulfrog
harrumphs near <clr:0000>Hebra Headspring<clr:ffff>!
Talk3003:

Bubbulfrog bobbling about!
Talk3004:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Yes, of course, <clr:0000>southwest<clr:ffff> of here...
